definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Wasabi is horseradish paste, a green horseradish paste.
sentences.chinese: 芥末是用山葵做的调味品，一种绿色的调味品。

sentences.english: Wasabi is horseradish paste, a green horseradish paste.
sentences.chinese: 芥末是用山葵做的调味品，一种绿色的调味品。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a method for preparing the high-calcium seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还公开了这种高钙调味品的制备方法。

sentences.english: The spice imparts an hot and peppery flavor to the dish.
sentences.chinese: 这种调味品给菜肴添加一种麻辣的味道。

sentences.english: Can you taste pepper in the pudding?
sentences.chinese: 我能尝到调味品中的洋苏叶。

sentences.english: This expensive spice was used only sparingly in cooking.
sentences.chinese: 这种价格不菲的调味品仅是用来烹调时节省地使用。

sentences.english: Put some relish on a slice of bread.
sentences.chinese: 将调味品涂到一片面包上。

sentences.english: A flavoring prepared from vanilla beans macerated in alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 香草豆在酒精中浸软后精制而成的一种调味品。

sentences.english: The Republic makes a good sauce for the barony .
sentences.chinese: 以共和为男爵爵位的调味品。

sentences.english: Why, he asks, is there no haute cuisine based on north African spices?
sentences.chinese: 他问道，北非调味品为什么做不出高级料理？

sentences.english: Spruce up your homemade lunch with some tasty extras, like condiments.
sentences.chinese: 再加些可口的调味品，让你的家常午餐更漂亮。

sentences.english: As flavorings, they are often added to candies and chocolates.
sentences.chinese: 作为调味品，则可加在糖果或巧克力中。

sentences.english: It is also flavoring Cointreau liqueur.
You never add seasonings when cooking.
sentences.chinese: 你烹饪时从不加调味品。

sentences.english: Maybe the food would be better if it had more oil and seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 要是菜里再多些油和调味品就好了。

definition: to improve taste/to make sth palatable
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
